mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Asset WHERE is_valid = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM Asset INNER JOIN Category ON Asset.category_id = Category.id WHERE is_valid = 1 ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM Asset_Disposal INNER JOIN Asset ON Asset_Disposal.asset_id = Asset.id INNER JOIN "User" ON Asset_Disposal.approver_id = "User".id INNER JOIN Category ON Asset.category_id = Category.id ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.asset_name, c.category_name, a.serial_number, a.spec, a.register_date, u.username, d.dept_name, d.dept_address, a.category_id FROM Asset a INNER JOIN Category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN "User" u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Department d ON d.id = u.department_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE Asset SET asset_name = #{asset.assetName}, serial_number = #{asset.serialNumber}, spec = #{asset.spec}, category_id = #{asset.categoryId} WHERE id = #{asset.id}
UPDATE Asset SET is_valid = 0 WHERE id = #{asset.assetId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Asset_Disposal (asset_id, approver_id, disposal_date, disposal_reason) VALUES ( #{asset.assetId}, #{asset.approverId}, SYSDATE, #{asset.disposalReason} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Asset a INNER JOIN Category c ON c.id = a.category_id INNER JOIN Asset_History ah ON ah.asset_id = a.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Rent_Content rc ON rc.asset_id = a.id LEFT OUTER JOIN RENT r ON r.id = rc.rent_id WHERE a.is_valid = 1 AND a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, k.* FROM ( SELECT a.asset_name, a.serial_number, c.category_name, ah.create_date, r.return_date FROM Asset a INNER JOIN Category c ON c.id = a.category_id INNER JOIN Asset_History ah ON ah.asset_id = a.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Rent_Content rc ON rc.asset_id = a.id LEFT OUTER JOIN RENT r ON r.id = rc.rent_id WHERE a.is_valid = 1 AND a.user_id = #{userId} ) k ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Asset WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL AND is_valid = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Asset WHERE user_id IS NULL AND is_valid = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Asset WHERE is_valid = 0

SELECT ah.id, a.asset_name, c.category_name, a.serial_number, ah.create_date, ah.status, ah.asset_id FROM Asset_History ah INNER JOIN Asset a ON ah.asset_id = a.id INNER JOIN Category c ON a.category_id = c.id WHERE ah.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ah.asset_id ASC, ah.create_date ASC

SELECT ah.id, a.asset_name, c.category_name, a.serial_number, ah.create_date, ah.status, ah.asset_id, u.username, u.emp_no, u.role, d.dept_name FROM Asset_History ah INNER JOIN Asset a ON ah.asset_id = a.id INNER JOIN Category c ON a.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN "User" u ON u.id = ah.user_id INNER JOIN Department d ON u.department_id = d.id WHERE ah.asset_id = #{assetId} ORDER BY ah.asset_id ASC, ah.create_date ASC
